question: Which city organized the International Symposium on Lighting-2019?
explanation: Ministry of Heavy Industries & Public Enterprises organized an International Symposium on Lighting (iSoL) at International Centre for Automotive Technology (ICAT), Manesar in Gurugram, Haryana on 14 November 2019. iSoL 2019 was inaugurated by the Minister of State for Heavy Industries and Public Enterprises and Parliamentary Affairs, Arjun Ram Meghwal. The symposium included a discussion to promote the Make in India initiative on the three pillars of the 4th industrial revolution, namely Artificial Intelligence (AI), robotics, and 3-D printing technology. The discussion also included implementing the LED technology to save energy and improve illumination across India.
